thoughts.text: I found some good language learning resources. I think I should start by choosing a language to learn and then finding a good resource to use.
thoughts.reasoning: I need to choose a language to learn and find a good resource to use so that I can start learning.
thoughts.plan:
- Choose a language to learn
- Research the best resources for learning that language
- Start using the resource to learn the language
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I choose a language that I am interested in and motivated to learn.
thoughts.speak: I found some good language learning resources. I think I should start by choosing a language to learn and then finding a good resource to use.
